name: UpSideWays!
description:
Manipulate gravity to solve puzzles, avoid traps and pitfalls and collect stars. 

Game is still in development.

Features Still In Development

  • Animation
  • Music
  • Controller Support
  • Saved Game States
  • Recording stars recieved
  • Locked levels until a star limit is reached
  • More levels!

Known Bugs

  • Player can clip through walls at high speeds. 
  • Player can stick to walls
